description:
Yoshiko goes out for a walk with her dog. But their walk is no simple walk.
Yoshiko rides on her dog`s back, and eventually they reach the mountains. A
race breaks out between Yoshiko and her dog traveling at unprecedented speed
and the legendary rider of the peak. Who will be the victor?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aho Girl ! Un tour en voiture !
ドライブ! アホガール
